title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: When adding a chart, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart even if the key is blank.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Create a chart by leaving the key field blank.
